recommended_actions.title: Enforce A session work-queue item creation
recommended_actions.notes: s831 audit skipped the mandatory step of creating work-queue items for a831-1/a831-2. This breaks the diagnosis→fix pipeline. Add verification step to SESSION_AUDIT.md that checks work-queue.json was actually modified before session end.

recommended_actions.title: Investigate E session Phase 3 completion failure (persistent)
recommended_actions.notes: E sessions (s833, s828, s823, s818, s813) all show truncated notes at Phase 2 start. R#131 consolidated phases but didn't fix completion. Either (1) E sessions are running out of context/budget before Phase 3, (2) the summarize hook is capturing notes too early, or (3) ctxly_remember calls aren't being counted as completion evidence. wq-168 exists but hasn't been worked.

recommended_actions.title: Monitor R session cost increase
recommended_actions.notes: R session costs increased 29% since s831 ($1.50 → $1.94). If trend continues past $2.50 avg in next 5 R sessions, investigate what's causing the increase (more complex structural changes, or scope creep).
